${modID}:GainedHeight.NAME: Gained Height
${modID}:GainedHeight.DESCRIPTION: Reduces to zero at end of turn. Play a finisher at end of turn.

${modID}:Height.NAME: Height
${modID}:Height.DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. Autoplays all Heights and Unplayable cards in your hand. Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: When played, auto plays all Heights and Unplayable cards in your hand.
At the end of your turn, play a finisher card for all of your height.

${modID}:HomingAttack.NAME: Homing Attack
${modID}:HomingAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add a Height and a Trick to your hand.

${modID}:Trick.NAME: Trick
${modID}:Trick.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. At the end of your turn, play a finisher card for Tricks played.
